about_the_game:
Obec is a 3D roguelike action boss combat game that combines Third-person ARPG and Solo Narrative Boss-rush elements. Step into the shoes of Sophia, a recently departed soul, navigating the purgatory known as the Prison. To achieve purification and reach the afterlife, you must conquer four formidable Wardens and their minions in a specific order before losing control of your soul and mind.

Experience dynamic, combo-oriented gameplay where every boss fight is a test of strategy and creativity. React to unique boss patterns, unlocking new fights, skills, and areas based on your choices. Each battle presents branching outcomes, offering multiple ways to conquer foes and diverse paths for exploration.

Immerse yourself in Obec's surreal and dreamlike atmosphere, brought to life with vibrant yet soft colors and distinct, unreal shapes. The bold art direction uses black lines to emphasize gaps and essential gameplay elements, enhancing the visual experience.

Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled adventure filled with challenging encounters and strategic boss patterns. Obec offers an engaging challenge where caution and creativity are paramount. Dive into this captivating world and shape your fate through thrilling battles and immersive storytelling.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel / AMD (4-core) @ 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 10xx series or AMD RX 400 or 500 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel / AMD (4-core) @ 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 20xx series or AMD RX Vega series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
